overview: It all started with a blindfold, but who knows what's going to happen next! Cum find out as we put a blindfold on Megan Rain, Sara Luvv, Marley Brinx, August Ames, Abella Danger and more unsuspecting girls, and fuck them like they've never been fucked before. These girls better brace themselves, because they have no idea what to expect!
title: It Started with a Blindfold
